Package state

package state
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Attack
    ConcreteState of the State pattern.Attack phase defines behavior for advance, attack and card commands that are valid in this state, and for the others signifies that the command is invalid.
    Edit
    The abstract sub class Edit contains states for Preload and Postload states.
    End
    The End class represents the end phase of the game.
    Fortify
    The Fortify class represents the phase where players can choose to fortify their countries.
    JunitTestState
     
    loadSaveTest
    The SaveLoadGameTest class includes test cases for savegame and loadgame functionality.
    MainPlay
    ConcreteState of the State pattern.
    Phase
    The abstract class Phase manages the states in the State pattern.
    phaseValidation
    The class PhaseValidation tests if right phase is being executed at right time.
    Play
    ConcreteState of the State pattern.
    PlayGame
     
    PlaySetup
    Concrete state representing the setup phase of the game.
    PostLoad
     
    Preload
    Concrete state representing the phase before loading a map.
    Reinforcement
    Concrete state representing the Reinforcement phase of the game.
    tournamentValidation
    tournamentValidation is used for successfully validating the given tournament scenario
